Docs.summary: An event object that is used during a Microsoft InfoPath merge or view switching event.

remarks.para: This type is a wrapper for a coclass that is required by managed code for COM interoperability. Use this type to access the members of the COM interface implemented by this coclass. For information about the COM interface, including a link to descriptions of its members, see.
The DocEvent object provides the property that can be used within a merge or view switching event to programmatically interact with the data in a form's underlying XML document.
The DocEvent object is passed as a parameter to the and events of an InfoPath form. The XDocument property that it provides is available only during these events.
